name: Racing Fever 2
description:
HIGH SPEED DRIVING
Race at high speeds, drive against traffic and overtake cars!
Nothing is forbidden in Racing Fever 2, More Danger = More Coins!

HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS
Enjoy the cutting edge 3D graphics with realistically created environments and amazingly detailed cars.

DRIVE IT YOUR WAY
Control your car as you like. We know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!

ESCAPE MODE
In this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your car!

MULTIPLE CAMERA ANGLES
Each camera angle offers a unique driving experience.

KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic driving
- 19 different cars (new cars on the way!)
- Rich traffic: Trucks, Buses, Vans, Pickups, SUVs & etc.
